name: Wrecking Santa
description:
Wrecking Santa is a 2.5D Action game made as an end-of-year project during the first year of Game Design's study at Isart Digital Paris. It is also the first project carried out by a team of several members from different courses (Game Design, Game Programming, and Music and Sound Design) in which I have had the chance to participate.

In Wrecking Santa, you play Santa Claus who has decided to revolt and make the celebrations of this world disappear. Fight the minions of evil through 5 thrilling levels which represent Easter, Halloween, and even Christmas in your quest for eradication!

Members of Team Banana :

Game Design : 

  • Hugo VELOSO (https://www.linkedin.com/in/hugo-veloso-2775a7231)
  • Anthony SABATINI (https://www.linkedin.com/in/anthony-sabatini-a3b437231)
  • Lena OGULLUK (https://www.linkedin.com/in/lena-ogulluk-05549b232)
  • Baptiste WISDORFF (https://www.linkedin.com/in/baptiste-wisdorff-6421a821b)
  • Matis BORNET

Game Programming :

  • Rémi SERRA
  • Aran HIBLOT
  • Solène MENDES

Music and Sound Design : 

  • Benoit LAURY-BRACHET
